content.question: A student will hold the left end of five identical metersticks. Each meterstick has a weight or weights attached to it, as shown in the figures below. In which case will the torque about the studentâ€™s hand be greatest?

choices.label: The figure shows a horizontal meterstick with a 250 gram weight suspended from the center of the meter stick.
The figure shows a horizontal meterstick with a 250 gram weight suspended from the right end of the meterstick.
The figure shows a horizontal meterstick with two 250 gram weights suspended from it, one from the center and one from the right end of the meterstick.
The figure shows a horizontal meterstick with a 300 gram weight suspended from the center of the meterstick.
The figure shows a horizontal meterstick with a 500 gram weight suspended from near the right end of the meterstick.

content.answer: The figure shows a horizontal meterstick with a 500 gram weight suspended from near the right end of the meterstick.
